# Issue Templates for Teachers üìù

Welcome! This directory contains easy-to-use templates that help you request changes to the Mergington High School Activities system without needing to know technical details.

## How to Create an Issue

1. **Go to the [Issues page](../../issues)**
2. **Click the green "New issue" button**
3. **Choose the template** that best matches what you need
4. **Fill out the form** with as much detail as possible
5. **Click "Submit new issue"**

That's it! The system will automatically assign a Copilot coding agent to handle your request.

## Available Templates

### üéØ Add New Activity
Use this when you want to add a completely new activity to the system.

**What you'll need to provide:**
- Activity name
- Description
- Days and times it meets
- Maximum number of participants
- Category (Sports, Arts, Academic, etc.)

**Example use case:** "We're starting a new Robotics Club that meets on Tuesdays"

---

### ‚úèÔ∏è Update Existing Activity
Use this when you need to change information about an activity that already exists.

**What you can update:**
- Activity name
- Description
- Schedule (days/times)
- Maximum participants
- Student enrollment

**Example use case:** "Chess Club is changing from Mondays to Wednesdays"

---

### üóëÔ∏è Remove Activity
Use this when an activity needs to be removed from the system.

**What you'll need to provide:**
- Activity name
- Reason for removal
- Confirmation that students have been notified

**Example use case:** "Drama Club is cancelled due to teacher unavailability"

---

### üêõ Bug Report
Use this when something isn't working correctly in the application.

**What you'll need to provide:**
- What part of the app has the problem
- What happened vs. what should happen
- Steps to make the problem occur again

**Example use case:** "When I try to enroll a student, I get an error message"

---

### üé® UI Improvement
Use this when you want to change how the application looks or make it easier to use.

**What you can request:**
- Change text or labels
- Update colors or layout
- Add or remove visual elements
- Make things easier to understand

**Example use case:** "The buttons are too small and hard to click"

---

### ‚ú® Feature Request
Use this when you want to suggest a new capability for the application.

**What you'll need to provide:**
- What new feature you want
- What problem it solves
- How you imagine it working

**Example use case:** "Add ability to export student rosters to a spreadsheet"

---

### üë§ Teacher Account Management
Use this when you need to add, remove, or update teacher accounts.

**What you can request:**
- Add new teacher account
- Remove teacher account
- Update teacher information
- Reset password

**Example use case:** "Add account for new teacher Ms. Johnson"

---

## Tips for Writing Good Issues

### ‚úÖ DO:
- **Be specific**: Include exact names, numbers, and details
- **Explain why**: Help us understand the reasoning behind your request
- **Provide examples**: Show us what you mean with concrete examples
- **Fill out all required fields**: This helps us implement your request faster
- **Use the right template**: Choose the template that best matches your need

### ‚ùå DON'T:
- Don't worry about technical details - the templates will guide you
- Don't combine multiple unrelated requests - create separate issues instead
- Don't leave required fields blank - we need this information to help you

## What Happens After You Submit?

1. **Assignment**: A Copilot coding agent will be automatically assigned to your issue
2. **Implementation**: The agent will read your request and make the necessary changes
3. **Testing**: The agent will test the changes to make sure they work correctly
4. **Notification**: You'll get updates as the agent works on your request
5. **Review**: You can review the changes and provide feedback if needed
6. **Completion**: Once everything looks good, the changes will be merged into the application

## Need Help?

- **Questions about using templates**: Create an issue using any template and we'll help you
- **General questions**: Check the [Documentation](../../docs/how-to-develop.md)
- **Something urgent**: Reach out to the technical team directly

## Examples of Good Issues

### Good Example 1: Adding an Activity
```
Activity Name: Weekend Cooking Club
Description: Learn to cook healthy meals and international cuisine
Days: Saturdays
Time: 10:00 AM to 1:00 PM
Max Participants: 15
Category: Community
```

### Good Example 2: Reporting a Bug
```
Area: Student enrollment
What happened: Error message appears when enrolling student@email.com
Expected: Student should be enrolled successfully
Steps: 1. Click "Enroll Student", 2. Enter email, 3. Click submit
Frequency: Every time
```

### Good Example 3: UI Improvement
```
Area: Activity cards
Current: Activity descriptions are cut off after one line
Desired: Show full description or "Read more" button
Why: Teachers need to see complete activity information
```

---

**Remember**: These templates are designed to make your life easier! You don't need to know anything about programming or technical details. Just fill out the forms with the information you have, and the system will handle the rest. üöÄ
